name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_cfafefe1-8392-472d-99e5-e82ddfb69ae8
text:
rule unauthorized_remote_desktop_access_attempt {
  

  meta:
    
    author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "Default_Admin_account_Credential_Exposure"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Privilege escalation"
    mitre_attack_technique = "Valid accounts"

  events:
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Windows"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type= "6416"
    $e.principal.user.userid = $user

   match:
    $user over 5m 

  outcome:
    
    $risk_score = 50

  condition:
    $e
}
author: TCS Cloud MDR COE team
